name: Home Server Power Manager
short_description:
Home Server Power Manager is a lightweight utility to allow suspending server machines when they are inactive for a certain period of time.

This program allows you to automatically suspends home servers (i.e. headless servers used for file sharing, file printing, etc) when no clients are connected for a certain time (15 min) and when they do not have other tasks to complete.

The program is composed of modules to monitor different tasks, as file sharing, printing, music playing, in order to decide if the machine shall be suspended.

More details can be found in the wiki of the project.
summary: Power Management for Linux Home Servers using UDP.
